nodes.text: Yram, formally styled Her Royal Highness, Queen Yram of Naboo, was a female Human who served as the heir to the throne of Naboo.

A female Human, Yram ascended to the throne of Naboo around 500 BBY, taking up residence in the Royal Palace in Theed. Sometime after her death, the Naboo memorialized their former Queen by erecting a towering obelisk called the Queen Yram's Needle in a courtyard near Theed University.
